pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a serene and majestic aerial view of a mountain range enveloped in thick, white clouds and fog. The camera glides slowly forward, revealing the vast, ethereal landscape. In the foreground, the lush green slopes of a mountain are partially visible, while in the distance, the dark peaks of other mountains pierce through the sea of clouds under an overcast sky.
